# Spacing & Padding Control the whitespace around and within components using spacing and padding attributes. ## Padding `view .html [ box blue 200x200 [ padding: 20 text "Content with padding" ] ]` ## Spacing Between Children `view .html [ across [ spacing: 10 text "Item 1" text "Item 2" text "Item 3" ] ]` ## Margin `view .html [ button "Click Me" [ margin: 10 ] ]` ## Attributes - **padding**: Space inside the component - **spacing**: Space between children - **margin**: Space outside the component ## See Also - [Alignment](/wiki/core/layout/alignment-valign/) - Alignment options - [CSS Classes](/wiki/shared/styles/css-classes/) - Styling reference
